page.title: 03Housing
page.content: Many of the houses in this area were built in the 19th centuary.They are made out of stones,and many of them are farm houses.In the village there are six council houses,a farm,a school ,a Post Office and many small cottages .The school building is made of long facing stones,it also has six large windows,a small loby and a small shed where we keep sports equipment.The roof is made out of slates.The Post Office is a small building on the hill.Most of the houses are cottages. There are not many new houses here but most of them have been renovated.The newest house is about thirty years old .At the bottom of the hill there is an old mill which is not in use anymore. It is now a house.There are also many farm houses in the area which are large houses built of local stone and slate.
